name: Vader's Helmet
Lore: '''If once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. Consume you it will, as it did Obi-Wan''s apprentice.''',
Text: 'Deploy on [Vader] Vader.  When Vader moves to same site as a Jedi or Skywalker, opponent loses 1 Force.  If Obi-Wan''s Journal here, may place it on bottom of opponent''s Lost Pile.  While with opponent''s character of ability > 4, Vader is power +1 and draws two battle destiny if not able to otherwise. (Immune to Alter.)',
